snippet: A consortium signed a deal, settling a long-running dispute over cost overruns that had put the $3.2 billion project in jeopardy.
lead_paragraph: A consortium signed a deal, settling a long-running dispute over cost overruns that had put the $3.2 billion project in jeopardy.

headline.main: Deal Is Reached to Widen Panama Canal
headline.print_headline: Deal Is Reached To Widen Panama Canal
